text: Ara iyatimaderake yaca'i karabe [1] ye paryanta na tara biyera yogya haya; atahpara tadera madhye bhalo-manda bicarera jnana dekhate pele [2] tadera sampada taderake phiriye da'o [3]. Tara bara haye yabe bale apacaya kare taratari kheye phelo na. Ye abhabamukta se yena nibrtta thake ebam ye bittahina se yena sanyata parimane bhoga kare [4]. Atahpara tomara yakhana taderake tadera sampada phiriye dibe takhana saksi rekho. Ara hiseba grahane allaha'i yathesta
